Entries.default: "We hear word of the great city of Ukaizo, deep within Ondra's Mortar!"
"Captains take heed! Fire spills from Magran's Teeth!"
"Rauatai offers coin in exchange for word of what befell the outpost at Hasongo!"
"Captains be warned! A great beast has been sighted in the waters around Port Maje!"
"We lament the passing of Priest Kasu, loyal servant of Rikuhu!"
"An attack upon the Spire of the Soul-Seers has been repelled, the attackers slain!"
"Queen Onekaza II is slain! We urge peace in these terrible times!"
"I tell the day's news, I do not comment upon it."
"Noble Dobasa offers the finest of handwoven baskets! Inquire in Periki's Overlook!"
"Massacre at the Watershapers Guild! The guards offer reward for the capture of those responsible!"
"For guidance you can trust, obtain one of Sanza's maps, in Queen's Berth!"
"A change of leadership at the Vailian Trading Company, as Director Lueva Alvari takes command!"
"Sabotage! The powderhouse at the Brass Citadel, destroyed! Many lives lost!"
"Amira's blessings upon all visitors to our fair city!"
"Prince Aruihi is slain! Queen Onekaza swears vengeance against those responsible!"
"Hazanui KarÅ« has been slain! Queen Onekaza II condemns this terrible act!"
"The Vailian director, slain! Queen Onekaza II seeks those responsible!"
"Let it be known that there is a reward offered for the capture of the assassins responsible for the death of our queen!"
"The animancers of the Spire seek brave souls! Fair wages for those who volunteer!"
"A Herald of Berath has come to our city! The priests prophesy a time of great change!"
